text: J Lo & A - Rod Compare Tan Lines In South of France J Lo and A - Rod Compare Tan Lines in South of France EXCLUSIVE Bad news for the rest of us - - Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez are getting even more bronzed and beautiful than they already are. The couple jetted off to the South of France, and boarded a yacht off Antibes for a day in the sun. J Lo wore a sexy, tiny crochet monokini, and A - Rod wore... well, who really cares? He did try some high diving off the deck, but the bigger point is they looked freakin'amazing while soaking up the R & R. Don't worry, they applied plenty of SPF.
